TextLibrary.Text: Elistara
I have an obligation that I must meet.
I have an obligation that I must meet.
I have an obligation that I must meet.
I have an obligation that I must meet.
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
I am bound by my oath as a Dragonknight to travel to the Dragonrealm and inform Crystal's parents that she was lost in battle. I may then request another mount.
I am bound by my oath as a Dragonknight to travel to the Dragonrealm and inform Crystal's parents that she was lost in battle. I may then request another mount.
I am bound by my oath as a Dragonknight to travel to the Dragonrealm and inform Crystal's parents that she was lost in battle. I may then request another mount.

I see. Well... there's a problem with that.
I see. Well... there's a problem with that.
I see. Well... there's a problem with that.
I see. Well... there's a problem with that.
A problem? What is it?
A problem? What is it?
A problem? What is it?
A problem? What is it?
I traveled through the Dragonrealm on my way here. The Dragons are gone.
I traveled through the Dragonrealm on my way here. The Dragons are gone.
I traveled through the Dragonrealm on my way here. The Dragons are gone.
I traveled through the Dragonrealm on my way here. The Dragons are gone.
Gone? They can't just be gone.
Gone? They can't just be gone.
Gone? They can't just be gone.
Gone? They can't just be gone.
They are. We don't know where, but we think that the Minotaurs captured them and took them into the Realms of Death.
They are. We don't know where, but we think that the Minotaurs captured them and took them into the Realms of Death.
They are. We don't know where, but we think that the Minotaurs captured them and took them into the Realms of Death.
They are. We don't know where, but we think that the Minotaurs captured them and took them into the Realms of Death.
All of them?
All of them?
All of them?
All of them?
All except old Kelthurax - I think he slept through the whole thing. They were smart not to wake him.
All except old Kelthurax - I think he slept through the whole thing. They were smart not to wake him.
All except old Kelthurax - I think he slept through the whole thing. They were smart not to wake him.
All except old Kelthurax - I think he slept through the whole thing. They were smart not to wake him.
Then I must make my report to Kelthurax. It is what my oath demands.
Then I must make my report to Kelthurax. It is what my oath demands.
Then I must make my report to Kelthurax. It is what my oath demands.
Then I must make my report to Kelthurax. It is what my oath demands.
I've met Kelthurax. He'll probably just eat you.
I've met Kelthurax. He'll probably just eat you.
I've met Kelthurax. He'll probably just eat you.
I've met Kelthurax. He'll probably just eat you.
It is his right. I failed his kin - he can mete out any punishment he desires. Will you accompany me?
It is his right. I failed his kin - he can mete out any punishment he desires. Will you accompany me?
It is his right. I failed his kin - he can mete out any punishment he desires. Will you accompany me?
It is his right. I failed his kin - he can mete out any punishment he desires. Will you accompany me?
I will, and I'll help you in any way I can. But I draw the line at being eaten.
